1351250.name: Secrets of Magic 3: Happy Halloween
1351250.description:
Victoria has become a teacher at Mystic Academy of Magic and your creativity is needed to help her decorate the schoolhouse for Halloween. Match your way through this fun and phantasmal adventure game, overcome tough obstacles, use power-ups to help you win gold to buy amazing Halloween decoration items and unlock new items as you progress in your game. Are you up for this spooky challenge?

Features

  • Get into the Halloween mood with this clever match 3 game
  • Fun gameplay with tons of challenge levels
  • Plan your moves, race against time or play it relaxed
  • Collect gold to buy Halloween decoration items
  • Tough obstacles and cool power ups

Play Secrets of Magic: The Book of Spells

Play Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards
1351250.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
